remarks: Relationship between ` mapd ` and ` HVMap ` , which can be used to satify the last hypothesis of ~ mapdpg .  Equation 10 of [Baer] p. 48. (Contributed by NM, 29-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapdhvmap.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdhvmap.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdhvmap.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
mapdhvmap.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
mapdhvmap.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
mapdhvmap.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdhvmap.j $e |- J = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
mapdhvmap.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdhvmap.p $e |- P = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdhvmap.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdhvmap.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
mapdhvmap $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = ( J ` { ( P ` X ) } ) ) $.
